sentences.en: A seagull at two hundred fourteen miles per hour!
sentences.cn: 一只海鸥达到了时速二百一十四英里!

sentences.en: A seagull fluttered down with an injured wing.
sentences.cn: 一只海鸥拍打着翅膀飞落下来.

sentences.en: A seagull swooped down in front of her car, causing her to slam on the brakes.
sentences.cn: 一只海鸥突然扑到她的车前，她急忙猛踩刹车。

sentences.en: A small dog barked at a seagull he was chasing.
sentences.cn: 小狗对着它正在追赶的一只海鸥吠叫。

sentences.en: Before he learned this, however, he found that moving more than one feather at that speed will spin you like a rifle ball... and Jonathan had flown the first aerobatics of any seagull on earth.
sentences.cn: 他在学到这一点之前，还发现在那样的速度下，只要转动一两根羽毛就可以像陀螺似地旋转……于是乔纳森成了世界上第一只做特技动作的海鸥。

sentences.en: More and more cold weather, you have to feed a seagull it?
sentences.cn: 天气越来越冷了, 你们去喂海鸥了 吗 ?

sentences.en: More than anything else . Livingston Seagull loved to fly.
sentences.cn: 乔纳森喜爱飞行胜于一切.

sentences.en: Seagull looked down at him and nodded.
sentences.cn: 乔纳森低头望着他,点点头.

sentences.en: The old seagull looked at him kindly.
sentences.cn: 这只老海鸥慈祥地望着他。

sentences.en: The Seagull brings you the world of purity and love.
The seagull stretched its wings out and sailed along with the current.
sentences.cn: 海鸥展开翅膀,贴着水面飞行.

sentences.en: The Seagull, the latest product of the Panasonic Electric Co.
sentences.cn: 海鸥型, 松下电气公司的最新型产品.

sentences.en: The sound of seagull carry her back to childhood holidays by the sea.
sentences.cn: 她听到海鸥的叫声就回忆起童年时在海边度假的情景。

sentences.en: There is a seagull perched atop the mast.
sentences.cn: 有一只海鸥停歇在桅杆上.

sentences.en: They determined that from then on no one should kill a seagull.
sentences.cn: 他们决定从那时候起,任何人不得杀害海鸥.

sentences.en: We praised the courage of the seagull.

trans.tran_en: a large common grey or white bird that lives near the sea
